name: Escaping Grandmas House
description:
Escaping Grandmas House is the best running adventure game.
Help your Grandmas to collect the diamond in the house . Just run as fast as you can and pay attention to police man, he will be killing you overcome the obstacles in your world adventure!.
Enjoy the new funny and crazy adventures in Grandmas House.

It's easy! just keep running and jumping and have fun in Escaping Grandmas House

FEATURES

New obstacles
Beautiful new graphics
Free and Fun puzzle game.
Running and Jumping adventures
Funny and crazy Characters

How to play

Jump and run as fast you can.
Collect the gold.

Wanna have fun? Escaping Grandmas House is the right game for you, get it now for FREE!
